SELECT C.POST_NO, POST_CONTENT, LIKE_COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MODIFY_DT, CHECK_USE_POSTER, C.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_NICKNM, A.MOVIE_NO, D.MOVIE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(D.MOVIE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MOVIE_DT, D.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, D.POSTER, D.MOVIE_GENRE, RATING, POST_STATUS_CD, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE POST_NO = C.POST_NO) REPLY_COUNT, YOUTUBE_PATH, THUMBNAIL FROM POST C LEFT JOIN MOVIE_RATING A ON (C.POST_NO = A.POST_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER B ON (C.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN MOVIE D ON (A.MOVIE_NO = D.MOVIE_NO) LEFT JOIN POST_YOUTUBE ON (C.POST_NO = POST_YOUTUBE.POST_NO) WHERE POST_STATUS_CD = 500 AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY POST_NO DESC

SELECT C.POST_NO, POST_CONTENT, LIKE_COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MODIFY_DT, CHECK_USE_POSTER, C.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_NICKNM, A.MOVIE_NO, D.MOVIE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(D.MOVIE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MOVIE_DT, D.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, D.POSTER, D.MOVIE_GENRE, RATING, POST_STATUS_CD, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE POST_NO = C.POST_NO) REPLY_COUNT
FROM POST C LEFT JOIN MOVIE_RATING A ON (C.POST_NO = A.POST_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER B ON (C.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN MOVIE D ON (A.MOVIE_NO = D.MOVIE_NO) WHERE POST_STATUS_CD = 500 AND C.POST_NO IN (SELECT POST_NO FROM "LIKE" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) ORDER BY POST_NO DESC
